              ["test_1", [["c"]]],
              [" did not pass a binding to "],
              ["local_variable_get", [["c"]]],
              [", and so the "],

              [
                " was executed within the context of that method, where a local variable named "

            "title": [
              ["By default, "],
              ["eval", [["c"]]],
              [
                " will evaluate your variables in the current scope. To evaluate local variables in a different scope, you must capture the "
              ],
              ["binding", [["i"]]],
              [" where the local variables exist."]
            ]
          },

            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "def local_variable_get(name, bound=nil)\n  foo = :inside\n  eval(name,bound)\nend\n\ndef test_1\n  foo = :outside\n  p local_variable_get(\"foo\")\nend\n\ndef test_2\n  foo = :outside\n  p local_variable_get(\"foo\",binding)\nend\n  \ntest_1 #=> :inside\ntest_2 #=> :outside"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
